event:
category: Demonstration
title: [Day1] AeiROBOT Humanoid Robots in Manufacturing sites/factories
time: Tue. Jan. 0611:00 AM - 5:00 PM
description: Showcasing the Future of Collaborative Manufacturing: Alice 4 and Alice M1\\r\\nAlice 4 and Alice M1 are not just two advanced humanoid robots; they represent the vanguard of collaborative robotics, designed to tackle the most challenging and strenuous tasks in modern manufacturing and industrial settings.\\r\\n\\r\\nAt this exhibition, we proudly present a live demonstration of these two autonomous agents working in perfect synchronicity to execute tasks currently deemed too difficult, dangerous, or repetitive for human workers. Our showcase illustrates how the synergy between specialized robotic forms—a mobile platform and a dexterous bipedal model—unlocks unprecedented levels of efficiency and safety in the factory of tomorrow.\\r\\n\\r\\nAlice M1: The Foundation of Mobile Operations\\r\\nThe Alice M1 (left) is built upon a sturdy, precision-engineered mobile base, granting it exceptional stability and the ability to navigate complex factory layouts. M1 excels in tasks demanding reach, strength, and steady support. Its core function is to handle heavy payloads, transport delicate components across vast distances, and serve as a reliable anchor during intricate assembly processes. M1\\'s height and robust frame allow it to access high areas and lift industrial-grade objects that would require specialized lifting equipment if handled by people.\\r\\n\\r\\nAlice 4: Precision and Dexterity in Motion\\r\\nThe Alice 4 (right) is a marvel of biomechanical engineering. Its fully articulated, lightweight bipedal design provides human-level agility and dexterity. Alice 4 is the specialist for fine-motor tasks: handling small tools, wiring intricate circuits, inspecting minuscule defects, and working in confined, awkward spaces that a human cannot easily access or sustain for long periods. Its advanced hand-eye coordination systems and tactile sensors ensure flawless execution of delicate procedures.\\r\\n\\r\\nThe Collaborative Synergy: A Live Demonstration\\r\\nOur live factory simulation demonstrates their specialized roles coming together:\\r\\n\\r\\nHeavy Lifting and Placement (M1): Alice M1 uses its strength and stability to transport a large, awkwardly shaped industrial component from a storage zone to the central assembly area.\\r\\n\\r\\nPrecision Assembly (Alice 4): Once M1 securely holds the component in place, Alice 4 steps in. Utilizing its superior dexterity, it quickly performs the precise screwing, wiring, and diagnostic checks required to integrate the component.\\r\\n\\r\\nHazardous Intervention: The robots navigate a simulated high-temperature zone. Since the environment is too dangerous for human staff, M1 stabilizes a protective shield while Alice 4 performs a critical diagnostic check on a high-voltage conduit, demonstrating the robots\\' role in enhancing occupational safety.\\r\\n\\r\\nThis collaborative approach ensures that the unique strengths of both Alice M1 and Alice 4 are maximized, creating a highly efficient, tireless, and safe workflow. We invite you to witness how this sophisticated AI-driven cooperation minimizes error, reduces labor costs, and fundamentally redefines the boundaries of industrial automation. Welcome to the next generation of manufacturing, powered by Alice.

关于: AeiROBOT是一家韩国深度科技初创企业，专注于开发如ALICE系列的人形机器人。我们致力于将类人硬件（自主研发的无齿轮执行器）与生成式人工智能相结合，打造一个名为“全能机器人”的统一平台，旨在工业领域执行人类环境中的多样化任务。
event:
category: Demonstration
title: [Day1] AeiROBOT Humanoid Robots in Manufacturing sites/factories
time: Tue. Jan. 0611:00 AM - 5:00 PM
description: Showcasing the Future of Collaborative Manufacturing: Alice 4 and Alice M1\\r\\nAlice 4 and Alice M1 are not just two advanced humanoid robots; they represent the vanguard of collaborative robotics, designed to tackle the most challenging and strenuous tasks in modern manufacturing and industrial settings.\\r\\n\\r\\nAt this exhibition, we proudly present a live demonstration of these two autonomous agents working in perfect synchronicity to execute tasks currently deemed too difficult, dangerous, or repetitive for human workers. Our showcase illustrates how the synergy between specialized robotic forms—a mobile platform and a dexterous bipedal model—unlocks unprecedented levels of efficiency and safety in the factory of tomorrow.\\r\\n\\r\\nAlice M1: The Foundation of Mobile Operations\\r\\nThe Alice M1 (left) is built upon a sturdy, precision-engineered mobile base, granting it exceptional stability and the ability to navigate complex factory layouts. M1 excels in tasks demanding reach, strength, and steady support. Its core function is to handle heavy payloads, transport delicate components across vast distances, and serve as a reliable anchor during intricate assembly processes. M1\\'s height and robust frame allow it to access high areas and lift industrial-grade objects that would require specialized lifting equipment if handled by people.\\r\\n\\r\\nAlice 4: Precision and Dexterity in Motion\\r\\nThe Alice 4 (right) is a marvel of biomechanical engineering. Its fully articulated, lightweight bipedal design provides human-level agility and dexterity. Alice 4 is the specialist for fine-motor tasks: handling small tools, wiring intricate circuits, inspecting minuscule defects, and working in confined, awkward spaces that a human cannot easily access or sustain for long periods. Its advanced hand-eye coordination systems and tactile sensors ensure flawless execution of delicate procedures.\\r\\n\\r\\nThe Collaborative Synergy: A Live Demonstration\\r\\nOur live factory simulation demonstrates their specialized roles coming together:\\r\\n\\r\\nHeavy Lifting and Placement (M1): Alice M1 uses its strength and stability to transport a large, awkwardly shaped industrial component from a storage zone to the central assembly area.\\r\\n\\r\\nPrecision Assembly (Alice 4): Once M1 securely holds the component in place, Alice 4 steps in. Utilizing its superior dexterity, it quickly performs the precise screwing, wiring, and diagnostic checks required to integrate the component.\\r\\n\\r\\nHazardous Intervention: The robots navigate a simulated high-temperature zone. Since the environment is too dangerous for human staff, M1 stabilizes a protective shield while Alice 4 performs a critical diagnostic check on a high-voltage conduit, demonstrating the robots\\' role in enhancing occupational safety.\\r\\n\\r\\nThis collaborative approach ensures that the unique strengths of both Alice M1 and Alice 4 are maximized, creating a highly efficient, tireless, and safe workflow. We invite you to witness how this sophisticated AI-driven cooperation minimizes error, reduces labor costs, and fundamentally redefines the boundaries of industrial automation. Welcome to the next generation of manufacturing, powered by Alice.

M1\\'s height and robust frame allow it to access high areas and lift industrial-grade objects that would require specialized lifting equipment if handled by people.\\r\\n\\r\\nAlice 4: Precision and Dexterity in Motion\\r\\nThe Alice 4 (right) is a marvel of biomechanical engineering. Its fully articulated, lightweight bipedal design provides human-level agility and dexterity. Alice 4 is the specialist for fine-motor tasks: handling small tools, wiring intricate circuits, inspecting minuscule defects, and working in confined, awkward spaces that a human cannot easily access or sustain for long periods. Its advanced hand-eye coordination systems and tactile sensors ensure flawless execution of delicate procedures.\\r\\n\\r\\nThe Collaborative Synergy: A Live Demonstration\\r\\nOur live factory simulation demonstrates their specialized roles coming together:\\r\\n\\r\\nHeavy Lifting and Placement (M1): Alice M1 uses its strength and stability to transport a large, awkwardly shaped industrial component from a storage zone to the central assembly area.\\r\\n\\r\\nPrecision Assembly (Alice 4): Once M1 securely holds the component in place, Alice 4 steps in. Utilizing its superior dexterity, it quickly performs the precise screwing, wiring, and diagnostic checks required to integrate the component.\\r\\n\\r\\nHazardous Intervention: The robots navigate a simulated high-temperature zone. Since the environment is too dangerous for human staff, M1 stabilizes a protective shield while Alice 4 performs a critical diagnostic check on a high-voltage conduit, demonstrating the robots\\' role in enhancing occupational safety.\\r\\n\\r\\nThis collaborative approach ensures that the unique strengths of both Alice M1 and Alice 4 are maximized, creating a highly efficient, tireless, and safe workflow. We invite you to witness how this sophisticated AI-driven cooperation minimizes error, reduces labor costs, and fundamentally redefines the boundaries of industrial automation. Its advanced hand-eye coordination systems and tactile sensors ensure flawless execution of delicate procedures.\\r\\n\\r\\nThe Collaborative Synergy: A Live Demonstration\\r\\nOur live factory simulation demonstrates their specialized roles coming together:\\r\\n\\r\\nHeavy Lifting and Placement (M1): Alice M1 uses its strength and stability to transport a large, awkwardly shaped industrial component from a storage zone to the central assembly area.\\r\\n\\r\\nPrecision Assembly (Alice 4): Once M1 securely holds the component in place, Alice 4 steps in. Utilizing its superior dexterity, it quickly performs the precise screwing, wiring, and diagnostic checks required to integrate the component.\\r\\n\\r\\nHazardous Intervention: The robots navigate a simulated high-temperature zone. Since the environment is too dangerous for human staff, M1 stabilizes a protective shield while Alice 4 performs a critical diagnostic check on a high-voltage conduit, demonstrating the robots\\' role in enhancing occupational safety.\\r\\n\\r\\nThis collaborative approach ensures that the unique strengths of both Alice M1 and Alice 4 are maximized, creating a highly efficient, tireless, and safe workflow. We invite you to witness how this sophisticated AI-driven cooperation minimizes error, reduces labor costs, and fundamentally redefines the boundaries of industrial automation. Welcome to the next generation of manufacturing, powered by Alice.

Since the environment is too dangerous for human staff, M1 stabilizes a protective shield while Alice 4 performs a critical diagnostic check on a high-voltage conduit, demonstrating the robots\\' role in enhancing occupational safety.\\r\\n\\r\\nThis collaborative approach ensures that the unique strengths of both Alice M1 and Alice 4 are maximized, creating a highly efficient, tireless, and safe workflow. We invite you to witness how this sophisticated AI-driven cooperation minimizes error, reduces labor costs, and fundamentally redefines the boundaries of industrial automation. Utilizing its superior dexterity, it quickly performs the precise screwing, wiring, and diagnostic checks required to integrate the component.\\r\\n\\r\\nHazardous Intervention: The robots navigate a simulated high-temperature zone. Since the environment is too dangerous for human staff, M1 stabilizes a protective shield while Alice 4 performs a critical diagnostic check on a high-voltage conduit, demonstrating the robots\\' role in enhancing occupational safety.\\r\\n\\r\\nThis collaborative approach ensures that the unique strengths of both Alice M1 and Alice 4 are maximized, creating a highly efficient, tireless, and safe workflow. We invite you to witness how this sophisticated AI-driven cooperation minimizes error, reduces labor costs, and fundamentally redefines the boundaries of industrial automation. Welcome to the next generation of manufacturing, powered by Alice.

title: The Tele-opration with AIDIN nex-gen Robotic Hand
time: Tue. Jan. 0610:00 AM - 5:00 PM
description: At the AIDIN ROBOTICS booth, Visitors can experience teleoperation, one of the company’s imitation learning demonstrations that connects the robot hand with a sensor-integrated glove. The robot hand learns and replicates human movements in real time, showcasing its precise and delicate motion control. AIDIN Robot hand features high degrees of freedom and is equipped with in-house developed force/torque sensors. At CES, the company will unveil its second-generation robotic hand, while the first-generation model, currently used as a research platform, has already been exported to Amazon Robotics.

title: Smart ReBox – Intelligent Paper Box Reuse System
time: Wed. Jan. 0712:00 PM - 12:00 PM
description: Smart ReBox is an AI-powered robotic system that enables the reuse of logistics paper boxes in large-scale distribution and manufacturing environments.\\r\\nIt automatically sorts, inspects, and restores used paper boxes, removing foreign substances and tape, detecting damage, counting reuse cycles, and optimizing storage.\\r\\nBy extending the lifecycle of paper boxes, Smart ReBox not only reduces packaging costs for companies but also contributes to sustainability by minimizing waste and carbon emissions.

关于: 阿尔杰龙医疗是一家专注于衰老与生物年龄评估的创新公司，致力于开发前沿健康技术。我们聚焦于体外诊断试剂盒及基于生物标志物的检测技术，以实现对衰老相关疾病的早期诊断。我们的业务涵盖癌症、肾脏损伤、阿尔茨海默症及其他领域的解决方案。
event:
category: In-Booth Education
title: Early Detection of Kidney Damage: Transforming Preventive Health
time: Tue. Jan. 061:00 PM - 2:00 PM
description: Early detection of kidney injury is a critical yet often overlooked component of preventive medicine. Traditional biomarkers such as serum creatinine or urinary albumin typically rise only after significant renal damage has already occurred. Argeron Medikal introduces NephroTesT®, an innovative in-vitro diagnostic test designed to identify early kidney cell injury by measuring trehalase enzyme activity in urine — a novel and highly sensitive biochemical marker.\\r\\n\\r\\nDuring this in-booth education session, visitors will discover how NephroTesT® brings a new approach to kidney health monitoring and chronic disease prevention. Trehalase, a hydrolase enzyme located primarily in the renal tubular cells, is released into urine at the earliest stages of tubular stress or injury — even before glomerular markers change. By quantifying this enzymatic activity through a colorimetric or kinetic reaction, NephroTesT® allows clinicians and researchers to detect renal impairment weeks to months earlier than conventional methods.\\r\\n\\r\\nThe session will explain the scientific background of trehalase as a biomarker and review findings from preclinical and clinical validation studies showing its high sensitivity and specificity for early tubular damage. Comparative data will highlight how NephroTesT® complements or outperforms existing assays in identifying subclinical nephrotoxicity, diabetic nephropathy, and drug-induced kidney injury.\\r\\n\\r\\nParticipants will also learn about the test principle and workflow. NephroTesT® uses a simple urine sample and can be run on standard spectrophotometers or automated biochemistry analyzers without the need for complex instrumentation. The assay produces results within minutes and fits seamlessly into hospital, laboratory, or preventive screening workflows.\\r\\n\\r\\nNephroTesT® is being developed under CE compliance as a diagnostic and is supported by independent academic collaborations. Its compact format and reagent stability make it suitable for global deployment, particularly in regions seeking cost-effective and rapid screening solutions for renal health.\\r\\n\\r\\nBeyond diagnostics, this innovation aligns with public health and longevity goals by enabling early intervention and prevention of chronic kidney disease — one of the fastest-growing global health burdens. Identifying renal stress at its biochemical origin provides clinicians with an opportunity to adjust therapy, improve drug safety monitoring, and prevent irreversible organ damage.\\r\\n\\r\\nThe session will conclude with a discussion of future directions, including the integration of NephroTesT® into routine check-ups, insurance health programs, and wellness screening panels, where early detection translates directly into reduced costs and improved patient outcomes.\\r\\n\\r\\nJoin Argeron Medikal at Venetian Expo, Hall G — Booth 63432 (Eureka Park) to learn how a simple enzyme-based urine test can transform early kidney injury detection and redefine preventive healthcare.

event:
category: Demonstration
title: Live Demo: Port Guardian AI – Real-time Carbon & Air Quality Moni
time: Tue. Jan. 0611:00 PM - 11:00 AM
description: Join DataFlare’s live demonstration of Port Guardian AI, an award-winning marine environmental monitoring platform that measures and visualizes real-time carbon and air pollutant emissions across port areas. Using non-intrusive IoT sensors and advanced AI analytics, Port Guardian AI collects wind, emission, and vessel data directly from port surroundings — without requiring onboard installations. The collected data is transmitted to our cloud-based platform, where users can view intuitive dashboards displaying emission maps, live analytics, and performance insights. This demo highlights how DataFlare transforms traditional port operations into data-driven, sustainable ecosystems. Visitors will experience the real-time dashboard visualizing air quality, vessel activity, and emission intensity. The system also provides predictive insights to help port authorities and operators set carbon reduction strategies and monitor compliance with global environmental standards such as IMO and EU MRV. Through this demonstration, DataFlare aims to show how AI and sensor fusion technology can empower ports to take measurable actions toward carbon neutrality, enhance ESG performance, and drive digital transformation in maritime logistics. Come and see how Port Guardian AI is redefining the future of green ports through the power of AI and real-time environmental intelligence.

Our product specialists will walk visitors through the tablet’s seamless handwriting-to-text conversion, advanced note organization, and distraction-free workflow — all powered by our new-generation e-ink display and 8192 levels precision stylus.\\r\\n\\r\\nUnlike conventional tablets, Penstar focuses purely on what matters — clarity, texture, and focus. This allows attendees to feel the tactile joy of pen on paper, without eye strain or digital glare.\\r\\n\\r\\nThe booth will also host interactive sessions where guests can test Penstar’s new AI Voice Transcription feature, explore creative note templates, and compare real-time writing latency with traditional notebooks. To make the experience more engaging, visitors can participate in a “Sketch Your Focus” challenge — a 2-minute drawing or writing session to discover how natural digital handwriting can feel. Selected works will be showcased on our media wall and shared on Penstar’s official social channels.\\r\\n\\r\\nIn addition to product demonstrations, our media briefing segment will unveil Penstar’s 2025 global roadmap and new partnerships in display innovation. description: Step into skin innovation at CES as we unveil an immersive, full-sensory showcase of WELLFIT ® Skincare Solutions powered Mystic. This experience invites you to explore the frontier where engineered fine mists, precision warming technology, and customization treatment design converge to create next-generation full-body skin care in minutes. The booth is more than a chamber; it’s a responsive beauty engine that listens to your skin’s needs and answers with science.\\r\\nAs you enter the WELLFIT demonstration space, you’ll encounter our two signature spray booths, Mystic® and VersaSpa® booths crafted to envelope the body in ultra-fine micro-droplets that deliver targeted skin benefits with clinical intelligence. Every mist is formulated to move with the skin’s natural rhythms, optimizing absorption and performance while transforming the booth into a cocoon of innovation. \\r\\nGuests are invited to explore customization WELLFIT treatments, each designed to enhance your skin’s resilience and radiance. Our moisture treatment layers a quilt of lasting hydration that keeps skin feeling supple long after the moment has passed. The firming sequence energizes the skin’s surface for a smoother, more lifted appearance. The recovery ritual calls on electrolytes to refresh, recharge, and re-balance, perfect for reviving tired skin after a long day of innovation hunting. And for those focused on strength and protection, our barrier-supporting formulation reinforces the skin’s defensive shield, helping it stay calm, resilient, and CES-ready.\\r\\nAlongside these tailored skin treatment options, the Mystic booth allows customization of alluring fragrance pairings that elevate each treatment with a sensory flourish. These aromatic enhancements offer a personalized dimension, allowing you to curate the mood of your session—crisp, bright, warm, serene, or invigorating.\\r\\nFor visitors interested in tonal artistry, the Mystic booth’s mixology features shine. Dive into a palette of up to twelve customization tanning tones, where shade, depth, and finish are refined to match your individual vision. Whether subtle luminosity, editorial depth, or something in between, the custom-blend system brings color design into your hands. The process feels less like selecting a shade and more like crafting a bespoke experience, with the booth ensuring even, flawless results from head to toe.\\r\\nThroughout the demonstration, WELLFIT ambassadors will guide you through the technology, the science, and the customization elements that make this system a standout in the beauty-tech universe. Each moment is designed to offer clarity, curiosity, and a spark of delight, showing what becomes possible when engineered mist, responsive automation, and high-performance formulations work in harmony.\\r\\nJoin us at CES and experience the future of full-body skin care. WELLFIT ® Skincare Solutions powered by Mystic isn’t just a demonstration—it’s a glimpse into a new era where beauty technology becomes personal, expressive, restorative, and brilliantly engineered.\\r\\nThis is where beauty meets science and technology!

关于: IOMTEK公司致力于研发先进的辐射冷却及红外/紫外线阻隔薄膜，有效缓解农业、建筑和车辆领域的热应力问题。其AgriCool™薄膜在非洲、中东及东南亚地区展现出卓越性能并取得显著商业成功。
event:
category: In-Booth Education
title: AgriCool™ Radiative-Cooling Film Showcase
time: Wed. Jan. 071:00 PM - 5:00 PM
description: Join IOMTEK Inc., a global leader in advanced radiative-cooling and IR-blocking film technologies, for a live, interactive demonstration of AgriCool™, the world’s first scalable greenhouse film that passively cools crops and structures without electricity.\\r\\n\\r\\nAs the world faces increasing heat stress and rising energy costs, AgriCool™ provides a breakthrough solution for climate-smart agriculture and sustainable construction. Using advanced optical coatings that reflect sunlight while radiating heat to the sky, this film maintains cooler internal temperatures by up to 10°C compared to conventional coverings—reducing plant stress, improving yields, and saving energy.\\r\\n\\r\\nThe demonstration will feature a working greenhouse mock-up showing real-time comparisons between AgriCool™ and traditional polyethylene film under simulated sunlight. Visitors will be able to see, touch, and measure the temperature difference firsthand using thermal sensors and infrared imaging.\\r\\n\\r\\nAgriCool™’s innovation lies in its dual-function radiative and selective IR-blocking design, developed through IOMTEK’s proprietary nanomaterial coating technology. Unlike standard shading or cooling systems, AgriCool™ passively emits heat to the cold sky through the atmospheric transparency window (8–13 μm wavelength) while allowing visible light for photosynthesis. This mechanism enables year-round cooling performance without energy input or moving parts—ideal for off-grid and developing regions.\\r\\n\\r\\nProven successful in Africa, the Middle East, and Southeast Asia, AgriCool™ has already helped farmers in extreme climates improve productivity while reducing water consumption and pest damage. Pilot installations across Kenya, Malawi, Malaysia, and Qatar demonstrate up to 30–50% improvement in crop quality and lifespan of over 5 years, even under intense solar radiation.\\r\\n\\r\\nBeyond agriculture, the same technology is now being extended to building and vehicle cooling films, supporting global efforts toward zero-energy buildings and urban heat mitigation. IOMTEK’s broader mission is to deliver scalable materials that contribute to climate resilience, food security, and energy transition worldwide.\\r\\n\\r\\nDuring the event, our technical team will share real pilot data, video case studies, and insights from field partners such as the University of Malawi, HAVVA Agrotech (Malaysia), and Saint-Gobain APAC Ventures. We will also present upcoming collaborations in North America aimed at adapting AgriCool™ for commercial greenhouses, vertical farms, and solar-integrated structures.\\r\\n\\r\\nThis session is open to media representatives, investors, greenhouse manufacturers, construction firms, and sustainability professionals seeking innovative solutions for high-temperature environments. Participants are encouraged to engage in a live Q&A and networking session following the demonstration.\\r\\n\\r\\nExperience how radiative cooling—once a laboratory concept—has become a market-ready solution driving the next generation of green technologies for agriculture and buildings.\\r\\n\\r\\nEvent Highlights:\\r\\n- Case studies from Africa, the Middle East, and Southeast Asia\\r\\n- Collaboration and investment discussion opportunities\\r\\n- Q&A and interview session

event:
category: Demonstration
title: Interactive Humanoid Performance: IGRIS-C Responds to You
time: Tue. Jan. 0611:00 AM - 3:00 PM
description: At CES 2026, ROBROS presents a live interactive performance featuring its compact humanoid robot, IGRIS-C, designed to redefine the boundary between human presence and robotic intelligence. IGRIS-C embodies the company’s vision of Physical AI—robots that not only move but also perceive and engage in ways that feel natural, intuitive, and expressive.\\r\\n\\r\\nAs visitors approach the booth, IGRIS-C comes to life. The robot detects nearby movement or a friendly wave and responds with a subtle bow or gentle hand gesture, illuminated by expressive LED patterns that convey awareness. This simple yet powerful moment allows the audience to experience what it feels like when a machine genuinely recognizes them. The interaction is immediate and personal, transforming observation into communication.\\r\\n\\r\\nWhen visitors lift their cameras to capture the scene, IGRIS-C playfully joins in. It strikes poses such as forming a heart or raising a peace sign—movements that showcase its precise balance, coordinated control, and lifelike rhythm. The exchange creates a shared moment of delight, illustrating how humanoid robots can bring warmth and emotion into everyday encounters.\\r\\n\\r\\nAs the performance unfolds, IGRIS-C transitions into a more adaptive mode. Using AI-based imitation learning, the robot observes simple human gestures—like a hand movement or arm raise—and mirrors them in real time. Each motion is generated dynamically, not from a scripted sequence, but from AI’s real-time interpretation of human behavior. This display of learning-in-action captures the essence of Physical AI: a system capable of understanding motion context and reproducing it fluidly, as if responding on instinct.\\r\\n\\r\\nThrough these interactions, IGRIS-C reveals a new kind of expressiveness in robotics—one that goes beyond mechanical precision toward human-like responsiveness. The performance invites visitors to see the potential of humanoids as interactive partners that blend artistry, engineering, and intelligence in motion.\\r\\n\\r\\nStanding 154 cm tall and weighing 60 kg, IGRIS-C is engineered for indoor environments such as labs, offices, and educational settings. Equipped with dual-arm manipulation, human-like hands, LED expression interface, and mobile app control, it serves as a versatile platform for exploring human–robot collaboration and adaptive control research.\\r\\n\\r\\nThrough this live demonstration, ROBROS showcases how intelligent motion and emotional awareness can coexist within one integrated humanoid form. The IGRIS-C performance is not just a technical exhibition—it is a glimpse into the near future where robots move among us with understanding, subtlety, and purpose.\\r\\n\\r\\nVisit Booth #8871 to experience how ROBROS brings human interaction and robotic intelligence together—one movement, one gesture, one shared moment at a time.

building a future where mirrors listen, respond, and protect your privacy while connecting you with real people who help you feel your best.\\r\\nFrom Prismé Flip to Prismé Mini, and now Prismé Studio Pro, each creation blends elegance, empathy, and intelligence — beauty through trust.\\r\\n\\r\\nOur mission is simple:\\r\\n\\r\\nTo turn reflection into connection — and beauty into dialogue.\\r\\n\\r\\n⸻\\r\\n\\r\\nDay 1: Grand Introduction & Influencer Sneak Peek\\r\\n\\r\\nTheme: “Reflet de Beauté — A World First by Prismé”\\r\\nAudience: Global media, influencers, beauty creators, and early visitors\\r\\nVenue: Booth #54372 — Venetian Expo, Lifestyle Tech Zone\\r\\nDuration: Full-day curated experience with timed entry waves\\r\\n\\r\\n⸻\\r\\n\\r\\nEvent Flow\\r\\n\\r\\n🕙 10:00 AM — Opening Ceremony: “The Mirror Awakens”\\r\\n\\t•\\tAmbient lighting reveals the Prismé booth — a serene environment of soft pink and mirrored tones.\\r\\n\\t•\\tFounder Abraham M. takes the stage: “We believe technology should whisper, not shout.”\\r\\n\\t•\\tA 60-second cinematic brand film plays, showing the evolution — Flip → Mini → Concept → Studio Pro.\\r\\n\\r\\n🕥 10:30 AM — Live Storytelling: “From Reflection to Connection”\\r\\n\\t•\\tHost narrates Prismé’s origin story — from the simple mirror to a connected ecosystem.\\r\\n\\t•\\tKey pillars revealed on floating LED wall:\\r\\n\\t•\\tPrivacy by Design\\r\\n\\t•\\tBeauty through Dialogue\\r\\n\\t•\\tTechnology with Empathy\\r\\n\\t•\\tVisitors experience real audio whispers — short beautician greetings through the mirrors.\\r\\n\\r\\n🕛 12:00 PM — Influencer Hands-On Zone\\r\\n\\t•\\t6 mirror stations (Flip, Mini, Studio Pro) open for creators.\\r\\n\\t•\\tBeauticians connect remotely for live demo calls.\\r\\n\\t•\\tInfluencers record short “Reflection Reactions” for social media.\\r\\n\\t•\\tBranded tags: #RefletDeBeauté #MyPrismeMoment\\r\\n\\r\\n🕒 2:00 PM — Panel Talk: “The Future of Private Tech Beauty”\\r\\n\\t•\\tSpeakers: Prismé design engineers, partner beauticians, AI ethicist guest.\\r\\n\\t•\\tTopics: Privacy, self-image, and how AI can nurture rather than manipulate confidence.\\r\\n\\t•\\tModerated Q&A session, open to press.\\r\\n\\r\\n🕓 4:00 PM — Vision Showcase: Prismé 2 Concept & Studio Pro Reveal\\r\\n\\t•\\tLights dim, LED halo pulse transitions portraits.\\r\\n\\r\\n🕔 5:00 PM — Closing: “Reflet de Beauté — The Movement Begins”\\r\\n\\t•\\tRecap montage of moments captured during the day.\\r\\n\\t•\\tPress photo call and interviews.\\r\\n\\t•\\tPrismé gift sets distributed (Flip miniature, digital access cards).\\r\\n\\r\\n⸻\\r\\n\\r\\nKey Takeaway\\r\\n\\r\\nPrismé is not a gadget — it’s a philosophy.\\r\\nWhere beauty meets respect.\\r\\nWhere technology humbles itself before the human face.\\r\\n\\r\\nAt CES 2026, Prismé introduces not just products — but a new language of reflection.

event:
category: Demonstration
title: RealSPRAY (Marine Spray Painting Training Simulator)
time: Tue. Oct. 0610:00 AM - 3:00 PM
description: RealSPRAY is an immersive VR-based marine spray painting training system that delivers the same level of results as real equipment training.\\r\\nIt provides a precise model that predicts paint flow rate and coating thickness with high accuracy, while replicating the exact size and shape of real work environments to create a highly realistic training setting. The system offers multiple training modes tailored to the learner’s level, including a tutorial mode for beginners, a learning mode with various difficulty levels and paint surfaces, and a practical mode that enables hands-on training under real working conditions. It also features an inspector mode that allows trainers to evaluate and provide feedback on training results, ensuring a more structured and effective assessment process.\\r\\nRealSPRAY supports multilingual functionality, enabling users from different language backgrounds to participate in training. It currently supports 11 languages and tutorial voice guidance in 4 languages, with additional editing and customization options for flexible adaptation to global training environments.

category: Demonstration title: The Cocktail Party Effect (Private Executive / VIP Reception) time: Wed. Jan. 075:15 PM - 6:45 PM description: **INVITE-ONLY EVENT**

Live demonstrations of Attention Labs’ on-device Selective Auditory Attention (SAA) engine, showing how robots and AI agents can now participate in real group conversations. Inspired by the human 'cocktail party effect', guests will see voice separation, speaker tracking, turn-taking, and rapid multi-speaker dialogue in action.

Hosted by the cofounders of Attention Labs with invited engineering and product leaders from Hugging Face, OpenAI, Qualcomm, NXP, Samsung, Apple, Snap, Meta, NVIDIA, Intel, Google, and leading robotics startups.

Featuring live group-conversation AI, SAA-Lite on-device demos, and integration pathways across XR, robotics, TVs, and embedded compute.

Very limited capacity.
No walk-ins. Only approved guests on the list will be admitted.
Drinks provided.

description: S-KIT is a compact, non-invasive device that enables real-time health monitoring through advanced MEMS semiconductor technology, capable of capturing individual gas molecules. Unlike conventional systems, it provides immediate analysis of oral hygiene and vital signs. Its virus-resistant design ensures user comfort and portability. Data collected is securely uploaded to the cloud and analyzed with AI/ML algorithms for precise health insights. At just 1 cm in scale, S-KIT integrates microfluidic channels and a metal oxide semiconductor with a patent-pending system that stabilizes exhaled breath flow, enhancing detection accuracy by minimizing turbulence.

event:
category: Demonstration
title: VitalTracker & VitalPlatform Demonstration
time: Tue. Jan. 0611:00 AM - 5:00 PM
description: VitalTracker is Bioconnect Inc.’s proprietary, AI-powered solution for contactless biometric monitoring. Using only facial imaging from a standard camera—no wearables required—it accurately measures key vital signs such as heart rate, heart-rate variability (HRV), respiration rate, and SpO₂. The hardware-agnostic system processes data on device to protect privacy, delivering actionable health insights through kiosks and a mobile app for proactive health management.\\r\\nBioconnect’s core strength lies in the combination of VitalTracker, its contactless vital-sign solution, and VitalPlatform, a scalable data layer that integrates and analyzes rPPG-based biosignal data. BioConnect holds 14 patents across Korea, the United States, and Japan, has established partnerships with leading Korean construction and pharmaceutical companies, and has been recognized with the 2025 Minister of Science and ICT Award as well as selection as a CES 2026 Innovation Awards Honoree in the “Human Security for All” category.\\r\\nVisit Bioconnect Inc. at CES 2026, Booth #63701, to experience VitalTracker and VitalPlatform in person. See how a simple look at the camera can turn everyday spaces into inclusive, contactless health check points and unlock proactive health insights for your organization.

event:
category: In-Booth Education
title: ConvergX at CES 2026 congress
time: Mon. Jan. 059:00 AM - 7:00 PM
description: ConvergX® at CES 2026 Congress is a purpose-built, high-level commercialization forum designed to move beyond visibility and into execution. Hosted alongside CES 2026 in Las Vegas, the ConvergX® Congress convenes late-stage and already commercial technology leaders, global industry primes, investors, and public-sector stakeholders to address one central challenge: how proven technologies scale across sectors, markets, and geographies in a world where single-market strategies no longer work.\\r\\n\\r\\nUnlike traditional conferences or exhibition-driven programming, ConvergX® at CES is structured as a working congress. It focuses on technologies at TRL 8–9—innovations that are technically validated but constrained by fragmented commercialization pathways. These are not ideas seeking attention; they are deployable solutions seeking scale. The Congress is built to create alignment between technology readiness, market demand, validation infrastructure, and capital deployment.\\r\\n\\r\\nAt the core of ConvergX® at CES 2026 is the belief that cross-sector commercialization is now essential infrastructure. Energy, defense, mobility, aerospace, consumer electronics, climate tech, areospace, agriculture, manufacturing, military, mining, medicine, motor sports, and digital systems are no longer independent markets. Breakthroughs increasingly originate in one sector and find their greatest value when transferred into others. The Congress provides a structured environment where this transfer can happen deliberately—rather than by chance.\\r\\n\\r\\nProgramming at the Congress brings together founders and operators with global primes, OEMs, system integrators, investors, and policymakers. Sessions are designed around real commercialization bottlenecks: scaling across regulatory regimes, validating performance in extreme environments, adapting defense-grade or industrial technologies for consumer markets, and securing multi-market revenue streams. Discussions are grounded in real-world deployment experience, not theoretical innovation narratives.\\r\\n\\r\\nA defining feature of ConvergX at CES 2026 is its integration with the broader ConvergX® ecosystem, including Xpand™, Xpand™ Capital, and the ConvergX® Foundation. This integration allows conversations at the Congress to translate directly into next steps—whether that is field validation through extreme-environment testing, capital alignment for deployment, or engagement with public–private partners. The Congress is not an endpoint; it is an entry point into an execution platform.\\r\\n\\r\\nFor participants, ConvergX® at CES offers curated access rather than scale for scale’s sake. Attendance is intentionally limited to ensure meaningful engagement, credible deal flow, and actionable outcomes. SMEs gain a pathway to engage global primes as partners rather than vendors. Corporates and investors gain visibility into technologies that are already validated and ready to move across markets. Public-sector stakeholders gain insight into how innovation can be deployed faster and more reliably.\\r\\n\\r\\nUltimately, ConvergX® at CES 2026 Congress positions itself as the place where technology readiness meets global reality. It reflects a shift in how innovation must be commercialized in the coming decade—through integration, validation, and alignment rather than siloed growth. For those building, funding, and deploying the next generation of technology, ConvergX® at CES is not about attending another event; it is about participating in the infrastructure that will define how innovation scales globally.

event:
category: Demonstration
title: About G2POWER
time: Tue. Jan. 0610:00 AM - 6:00 PM
description: G2Power is a leading company in Korea\\'s smart grid industry, specializing in both heavy electrical equipment and renewable energy solutions. As a technology-intensive enterprise, we provide total solutions that encompass product manufacturing, installation, and maintenance. We hold NEP (New Excellent Product), NET (New Excellent Technology) certifications, and numerous patents, solidifying our position as a key IT solution provider in the smart grid sector. By integrating AI-based smart grid technology, we maximize energy efficiency and deliver real-time optimized power management solutions through big data analysis. Through the continuous development of AI and emerging technologies aligned with the Fourth Industrial Revolution, we manufacture the most innovative products in Korea and lead the creation of a new paradigm in the smart grid industry.\\r\\n\\r\\n\\\\"Intelligent AI Switchgear\\\\"\\r\\nSwitchgear is an essential system that distributes, controls, and protects electrical power safely and efficiently. It is widely installed in industrial sites, apartment complexes, buildings, data centers, and power plants.\\r\\nG2Power’s Intelligent AI Switchgear is equipped with deep learning-based diagnostic capabilities (Convolutional Neural Networks) that enable real-time partial discharge detection and predictive maintenance. This ensures reliable power supply and enhanced safety for critical infrastructures.\\r\\n\\r\\n\\\\"DC Arc Detection PV System\\\\"\\r\\nA Photovoltaic (PV) system generates electricity by converting sunlight into electrical energy. Due to its zero carbon emissions and low maintenance cost, it is widely used in homes, buildings, factories, and energy storage systems (ESS).\\r\\nG2Power’s DC Arc Detection PV System monitors current and voltage patterns in real time at the string level to detect DC arcs early, preventing potential fire hazards and equipment damage. It is especially effective in ensuring fire safety in large-scale solar farms and rooftop PV installations.\\r\\n\\r\\n\\\\"Immersed-Type ESS\\\\"\\r\\nAn Energy Storage System (ESS) stores electricity and supplies it when needed, enhancing power efficiency and stability across various applications such as electric vehicles, solar/wind systems, data centers, factories, hospitals, and residential buildings.\\r\\nG2Power’s Immersed-Type ESS uses a circulating insulating liquid to regulate battery cell temperature, significantly reducing the risk of fire and extending battery lifespan. Integrated with AI-based thermal control and battery module diagnostics, it ensures exceptional safety and operational efficiency in energy storage.

event:
category: Demonstration
title: Test your estrogen levels with 1 saliva drop
time: Tue. Jan. 0611:00 AM - 12:00 PM
description: Estrogen isn’t static. It changes day by day — sometimes hour by hour.\\r\\nYet most women only see a single lab value once or twice a year.\\r\\n\\r\\nThat’s why at our booth we’re offering on-the-spot estrogen trend tracking using a simple saliva check — no blood, no needles, no waiting.\\r\\n\\r\\nWith one drop of saliva, Ovul visualizes estrogen trends in real time using AI-based image recognition of dried saliva patterns. This is a wellness insight, designed to help women better understand how their hormones fluctuate.\\r\\n\\r\\nWhy estrogen trends matter\\r\\nWhether you are:\\r\\nnavigating perimenopause or menopause\\r\\ntrying to conceive naturally or with support\\r\\nor simply want to understand your cycle better\\r\\n\\r\\nEstrogen plays a central role in:\\r\\nsleep quality\\r\\nmood and energy\\r\\nhot flashes and headaches\\r\\novulation timing and fertile windows\\r\\n\\r\\nSeeing your estrogen trend — low, balanced, or elevated — helps connect the dots between how you feel and what your hormones may be doing.\\r\\n\\r\\nWhat happens at the booth?\\r\\nOne drop of saliva\\r\\nQuick visual analysis\\r\\nYou see your current estrogen trend zone\\r\\n\\r\\nWe explain what that trend commonly means\\r\\nNo diagnoses. No medical claims. Just personalized hormone awareness.\\r\\n\\r\\nWhat to do next (by life stage)\\r\\nPerimenopause & Menopause\\r\\nLearn how estrogen fluctuations may relate to hot flashes, sleep issues, or mood changes\\r\\nUse trends to have more informed conversations with clinicians or wellness providers\\r\\nTrack changes over time instead of guessing\\r\\n\\r\\nTrying to Conceive\\r\\nUnderstand estrogen surges that support fertile windows\\r\\nUse trend awareness alongside other cycle-tracking methods\\r\\nReduce reliance on one-time snapshots\\r\\n\\r\\nGeneral Hormonal Wellness\\r\\nNotice patterns between stress, sleep, supplements, and estrogen shifts\\r\\nBuild personal insight before symptoms escalate\\r\\nWhy this matters\\r\\n\\r\\nAfter speaking with 167 women and multiple menopause clinics and wellness partners, one thing is clear:\\r\\nWomen want continuous, simple, at-home hormone awareness, not occasional lab reports.\\r\\n\\r\\nDaily estrogen trend tracking turns hormones from a mystery into something you can observe, learn from, and act on thoughtfully.\\r\\n\\r\\n📍 Stop by the booth\\r\\n💬 Ask questions\\r\\n🧠 Learn what your estrogen trend is doing today

event:
category: In-Booth Education
title: PDP Overview
time: Tue. Jan. 0611:00 AM - 12:00 AM
description: PDP (Pulse Dual Pad) is Peachlight’s next-generation near-infrared (NIR) therapy device engineered to deliver deep, targeted, and professional-grade relief for muscles, joints, and connective tissues. Designed with high-density optical engineering and advanced pulsed-wave technology, PDP represents a significant step forward in at-home light therapy.\\r\\n\\r\\nEach PDP pad incorporates 288 high-power 880 nm NIR LEDs, arranged to maximize irradiance while maintaining uniform light distribution across the treatment zone. Near-infrared light at 880 nm is known for its deep penetration—reaching tissues several millimeters beneath the skin—and stimulating cellular activity, circulation, and mitochondrial function. This wavelength is particularly effective for addressing deep-seated discomfort in areas such as the hip joints, hamstrings, lower back, and other large muscle groups.\\r\\n\\r\\nA defining feature of PDP is its pulsed-wave driving system, which allows the LEDs to operate at higher peak power compared to continuous-wave devices. When pulsed at optimized frequencies, the LEDs deliver bursts of energy that enhance absorption while minimizing heat buildup on the skin. This results in up to twice the instantaneous power of traditional continuous operation, enabling more effective deep-tissue stimulation without compromising user safety.\\r\\n\\r\\nPDP is also built with flexible, medical-grade silicone, allowing the pad to contour closely to the body. This flexibility dramatically improves skin contact, ensuring that light energy is delivered efficiently with minimal loss. The silicone structure is not only soft and durable but also hygienic, resistant to sweat, and easy to clean, making it suitable for repeated daily use. The embedded reflective layer further increases optical efficiency by redirecting stray photons back into the skin.\\r\\n\\r\\nThe device works through a simple, intuitive interface and is compatible with standard power sources, allowing users to incorporate deep-tissue care into their routine whether at home, at the office, or during recovery sessions. PDP offers a non-invasive, drug-free solution that supports muscle relaxation, faster recovery, and long-term joint health.\\r\\n\\r\\nWith its sophisticated engineering and thoughtful ergonomics, PDP bridges the gap between clinical photobiomodulation systems and consumer wellness devices. It empowers users to access powerful, science-backed light therapy for relief, performance, and everyday comfort—anytime and anywhere.

event:
category: Demonstration
title: PercepXR (Pad Type) : Vision-Free Real Time Motion Tracking
time: Tue. Jan. 061:00 PM - 5:00 PM
description: PercepXR (Pad Type) is a vision-free, surface-integrated sensing module that enables real-time tracking of hand and object motion by detecting subtle changes in electric fields generated by moving conductive objects. Unlike conventional camera- or depth-based systems, PercepXR operates without optics, markers, or wearables, providing a new sensing layer for intuitive and robust human–machine interaction.\\r\\n\\r\\nThe system continuously measures dynamic voltage variations across a multi-array conductive film sensor, allowing it to estimate position, direction, velocity, and motion trajectories in real time. This enables natural in-air interaction above the sensing surface while remaining independent of lighting conditions, visual occlusion, or surface appearance. As a result, PercepXR maintains stable performance in environments where vision-based systems face fundamental limitations, such as low-light industrial settings, reflective surfaces, or privacy-sensitive spaces.\\r\\n\\r\\nThe pad-type form factor is designed for seamless integration into flat or slightly curved surfaces, making PercepXR suitable for a wide range of applications across XR, mobility, and robotics. Its ultra-thin, low-power architecture significantly reduces system complexity and energy consumption compared to vision-heavy sensing stacks, enabling more compact and efficient device designs.\\r\\n\\r\\nIn XR and spatial computing, PercepXR functions as a vision-free input interface for natural gesture interaction. Integrated into desks, armrests, or wearable docking surfaces, it enables continuous hand tracking and gesture recognition without requiring external cameras. This approach reduces power load, improves privacy, and supports slimmer device form factors, addressing key challenges faced by next-generation AR and XR systems.\\r\\n\\r\\nIn mobility environments, PercepXR provides a robust, touchless interaction layer for vehicles and transportation systems. Embedded into center consoles, dashboards, or armrest surfaces, it enables drivers and passengers to control infotainment, navigation, and system functions through intuitive in-air gestures. Because the system does not rely on visual data, it remains reliable under changing lighting conditions, vibrations, or partial occlusion, while also offering a privacy-safe alternative to in-cabin cameras.\\r\\n\\r\\nIn robotics, PercepXR serves as a real-time human–robot interaction interface and proximity-aware control surface. When integrated into robot workstations, control panels, or collaborative robot environments, it allows operators to issue commands, adjust modes, or interact with robots through natural hand movements. Additionally, PercepXR can support safety-aware interaction by detecting approach and motion dynamics near robot-adjacent surfaces, enabling more responsive and intuitive collaborative workflows.\\r\\n\\r\\nBy introducing a vision-free sensing layer that complements or replaces existing vision systems, PercepXR expands the design space for interactive systems across multiple industries. Its scalability, robustness, and energy efficiency position it as a foundational input technology for future spatial interfaces and Physical AI systems, enabling machines to better understand and respond to human motion in real time.

event:
category: Booth Media Briefing
title: Inside the Neuro–Body Experience
time: Tue. Jan. 062:00 PM - 4:00 PM
description: At CES 2026, SoulHeal Technology–DreamPhones invites media partners to take part in a guided, hands-on experience designed to demonstrate how cutting-edge neuroscience can be translated into everyday consumer technology.\\r\\n\\r\\n📍 Event Location: Venetian Campus, Venetian Expo, Level 1, Hall G — Booth 61235\\r\\n(SoulHeal Technology – DreamPhones)\\r\\n\\r\\nDuring this session, participants will experience our AI-driven neuro–body interface while seated in a comfortable, ergonomic chair. Depending on scheduling and availability, experience sessions range from approximately 5 to 30 minutes, allowing both quick first impressions and deeper evaluation. Media guests who pre-register will receive priority, skip-the-line access and extended experience time.\\r\\n\\r\\nDreamPhones uses adaptive AI to personalize rhythm, intensity, and transitions in real time, supporting mental clarity, improved rest efficiency, and better sleep experiences. Rather than explaining these ideas abstractly, the session allows participants to directly feel how subtle neuro-regulation principles can influence everyday states such as relaxation, focus, and recovery.\\r\\n\\r\\nMedia guests will also receive a brief introduction to the scientific foundations behind the technology, including how peripheral neural pathways and AI-driven feedback work together to create a consistent and intuitive user experience. The session concludes with time for questions, product photography, and follow-up conversations with the team.\\r\\n\\r\\nThis experience is designed to be concise, comfortable, and informative—offering a clear, first-hand understanding of how advanced neuroscience can be thoughtfully integrated into consumer technology, guided by our mission: Care for Every Mind.\\r\\n\\r\\nMedia Pre-Registration\\r\\nTo reserve priority access and a deep-dive experience, please email qiulin@10000.life\\r\\n with the following information:\\r\\n\\r\\nName\\r\\n\\r\\nMedia outlet / platform\\r\\n\\r\\nRole (reporter, editor, creator, etc.)\\r\\n\\r\\nLink to recent work or profile\\r\\n\\r\\nPreferred experience duration (5–30 minutes)\\r\\n\\r\\nAvailability during CES\\r\\n\\r\\nPre-registration deadline: January 5, 2026 (first come, first served).\\r\\nConfirmed guests will receive a reply with scheduling details.

event:
category: Demonstration
title: Inside UMED’s Innovation: A CEO’s Perspective
time: Tue. Jan. 0610:00 AM - 10:15 AM
description: Join us for an in-booth session where UMED CEO and urologist, Dr. Myung Chan Park, shares how UMED is redefining the future of bladder and catheter care through clinically grounded innovation. As a urologic healthcare startup, UMED is advancing the vision of “Hospital to Everyone” by transforming hospital-centered urologic procedures into accessible, data-driven digital healthcare that improves safety, prevention, and long-term outcomes.\\r\\n\\r\\nDr. Park will introduce UroRinse™ Light, UMED’s CES 2026 Innovation Award–winning automated bladder irrigation system designed for patients with long-term urinary catheters. He will explain how UroRinse addresses key challenges such as CAUTI, blockage, hematuria, and inconsistent manual irrigation by delivering safer, standardized, sensor-based irrigation cycles that can be used in hospitals, care facilities, and home environments.\\r\\n\\r\\nThe session will also highlight UroXpert™, UMED’s LLM-based digital urology platform that integrates clinical data, device data, and AI to generate expert-level insights. This unified ecosystem allows clinicians, caregivers, and patients to move beyond reactive treatment toward proactive, personalized prevention supported by real-world evidence.\\r\\n\\r\\nThis session offers a rare opportunity to hear directly from a practicing urologist-founder who has designed medical devices and digital platforms based on firsthand clinical experience and real patient needs. Attendees will gain insight into how UMED connects hardware, software, and medical intelligence to modernize urologic care globally, including upcoming steps to expand UroRinse adoption and enhance remote-monitoring capabilities through cloud-based infrastructure.\\r\\n\\r\\nDiscover how UMED is shaping the next era of urologic innovation and building “Urological Healthcare for All.”

description: This session is part of the CES Awards showcase organized by JETRO at the Japan Pavilion, featuring award-winning innovations from Japanese exhibitors at CES.\\r\\n\\r\\nUNTRACKED, a CES Award–winning company, will participate in this session as an exhibitor of the Japan Pavilion and present its award-recognized solution alongside other selected innovators.\\r\\n\\r\\nEach participating company will deliver a 3-minute presentation, consisting of: \\r\\n・a brief product introduction highlighting the core technology and use cases, followed by\\r\\n・a short moderated discussion focusing on what made the product innovative and why it was recognized by the CES Awards.\\r\\n\\r\\nUNTRACKED’s presentation will showcase the unique aspects of its technology that led to its CES Award recognition and its potential impact in the global market.

title: RoadBuddy App-in-Nav: The Next Standard for AI-Driven Driver Safe
time: Tue. Jan. 0611:00 AM - 11:30 PM
description: Experience VLIS RoadBuddy, the first mobile platform that merges in-app navigation (Mapbox / HERE / TomTom) with real-time AI drowsiness and distraction detection.\\r\\nOur unique App-in-Nav UI allows drivers to receive route guidance and safety alerts in one integrated screen—without switching apps or losing focus.\\r\\nWe will demonstrate:\\r\\n\\r\\nApp-in-Nav UI (Top: Navigation · Bottom: Safety Zone)\\r\\n\\r\\nAI-based drowsiness alerts with 4-step intervention\\r\\n\\r\\nVoice, vibration, quiz-based missions, and instant rest-suggestion flow\\r\\n\\r\\nGlobal routing with modular map engines\\r\\n\\r\\nSee how VLIS is redefining safe mobility for both individual and enterprise drivers.
